title: Roger Fischer
maintext:
BASSETT — Services for Roger W. “Bubba” Fischer, 84, Bassett, will be at 10 a.m. Friday, May 25, at St. Peter Lutheran Church in Bassett. Burial will be at Bassett Memorial Park Cemetery.
Visitation will begin at the church an hour prior to the time of service on Friday. Hoch Funeral Home of Bassett is in charge of the arrangements. He died Sunday, May 20, 2018, in Rock County Hospital Long Term Care at Bassett.
